title: Incorrect binary download pointer
description:
The link to download lucene from here is incorrect:

http://jakarta.apache.org/site/binindex.cgi

I haven't checked the source download but that would be worth looking at also.

comments.content:
This has been corrected.  Give some time for mirrors to catch up and for the site to be 
automatically updated.  Sorry 'bout that.
comments.author: Erik Hatcher
